ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Posible new items
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There s also a new NPC in the middle windmill named Forpar Fizfla. He cons amiable.  But whenever I try to talk to him, he says: Forpar Fizfla says Get
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Sep 20, 2000 at 07:24:51AM -0400, Lomack wrote:
> The reports of new quests are already starting to come in from this latest
> patch. Just about everyone is looking for a lead on one or more of the new
> FA Type quests. While looking around the Safehouse (rogue message board) I
> found a post where someone found some interesting information.

There's also a new NPC in the middle windmill named Forpar Fizfla.

He cons amiable. But whenever I try to talk to him, he says:
Forpar Fizfla says 'Get out you pesky Gnome! I don't need any Gnome germs!
Out, ye filthy beast!

Gnome germs?

The good thing is that he protects newbies. His aggro radius extends well
outside the windmill, and he has a quick reaction time. Just running a mob
behind the windmill is enough to make him jump out and kill it.
